title: Xbox Series X is Improving Backwards Compatibility - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.28.20
description:
Blessing is joined by Funhaus' Adam Kovic to talk about brand new details revolving around Xbox Series X Backwards Compatibility. 



Time Stamps - 

 00:03:15 - Housekeeping
It’s Kinda Funhaus week! We’re doing all sorts of crossover content with our pals at Funahus, like this episode of KFGD featuring Alanah Pearce. To catch the full rundown, head over to kindafunny.com/funhaus.
We have a huge Predator: Hunting Grounds Stream tomorrow. 2 p.m. until 5 p.m. on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack, Al Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:05:11 - Xbox Series X aims to be the most compatible console - Blog Post by Jason Ronald, Director of Program Management for Xbox Series X
00:16:56 - Do you think a feature like this, where ALL games run better on the Series X at launch and not just Series X games, will make the console a Day 1 buy for many, many more people? - Best Friends Q: The Nano Biologist
00:31:40 - Iron Man VR has Gone GOLD
00:39:38 - Apex Legends Season 5 Off to the Best Start of Any Season to Date
00:46:10 - Your PS Plus Games have been revealed - PS blog
00:50:30 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:54:10 - A recent presser for Xbox has told us that Xbox Series X will have the biggest and best line-up in Xbox history, and it will all be led by Halo Infinite. While I am a huge Xbox fanboy, can we agree that this may be too much pressure for one studio? - The Nano Biologist
01:01:08 - Squad Up: RobbyRob(PS4) - RobbyRobPlays
01:01:50- You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Alanah 

Thanks for the support!
